entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
